document.full_text: some iranian students may seek two-year, multiple-entry u.s. visas, the state department said on friday, giving them greater freedom to travel to the united states in a gesture to improve people-to-people ties.
document.title: u.s. revises visa policy in gesture to iranians
lines_and_colors: some iranian students may seek two-year, multiple-entry u.s. visas, the state department said on friday, giving them greater freedom to travel to the united states in a gesture to improve people-to-people ties.
